_header: All rich men that sits on dais
_description: Gospel for First Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: All riche men þat sittes on deseSerued with many maynsum mese…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And so on molde to mend oure mysþat we may bilde in endles blis
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Homo quidam erat diues.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica prima post trinitatem secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 104rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.272-276.
